name: Sync from upstream

on:
  schedule:
    - cron: '0 6 * * *'  # todos los d√≠as a las 06:00 UTC
  workflow_dispatch:

permissions:
  contents: write

jobs:
  sync:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4
        with:
          fetch-depth: 0

      - run: |
          git remote add upstream https://github.com/Juanignacioz/Frontend-Uberto-2025.git || true
          git fetch upstream --prune --tags

      - run: |
          for b in $(git branch -r --format='%(refname:short)' | grep '^upstream/' | sed 's#^upstream/##'); do
            git branch -f "$b" "upstream/$b"
          done
          git push --mirror origin
